languages.text: "И еще два года, чтобы втереться в доверие регента и пробраться на Эурак-V. Сейчас, когда Кассия на виду, и совет Дома вот-вот усадит ее на трон — не самое ли время отрубить змее голову?"

traits.locale_text: "И еще два года, чтобы втереться в доверие регента и пробраться на Эурак-V. Сейчас, когда Кассия на виду, и совет Дома вот-вот усадит ее на трон — не самое ли время отрубить змее голову?"
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "And then another two to get into the regent's good graces and reach Eurac V. Now Cassia is in the spotlight and the House council is about to put her on the throne — surely there is no better time to cut off the serpent's head?"
languages.original_text: "И еще два года, чтобы втереться в доверие регента и пробраться на Эурак-V. Сейчас, когда Кассия на виду, и совет Дома вот-вот усадит ее на трон — не самое ли время отрубить змее голову?"

traits.locale_text: "And another two years to get into the regent's good graces and reach Eurac-V. Now Cassia is in the spotlight and the House council is about to put her on the throne — surely there is no better time to cut off the serpent's head?"
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

traits.locale_text: "And another two years to get into the regent's good graces and reach Eurac-V. Now Cassia is in the spotlight and the House council is about to put her on the throne — surely there is no better time to cut off the serpent's head?"
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

traits.locale_text: "And then another two to get into the regent's good graces and reach Eurac-V. Now Cassia is in the spotlight and the House council is about to put her on the throne — surely there is no better time to cut off the serpent's head?"
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

traits.locale_text: "And then another two to get into the regent's good graces and reach Eurac-V. Now Cassia is in the spotlight and the House council is about to put her on the throne — surely there is no better time to cut off the serpent's head?"
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

traits.locale_text: "And then another two to get into the regent's good graces and reach Eurac V. Now Cassia is in the spotlight and the House council is about to put her on the throne — surely there is no better time to cut off the serpent's head?"
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: “在那之后，我们之中的两个人赢得了摄政王的青睐，渗透到了欧拉克五号星站。如今，卡西娅正站在聚光灯下，家族肯定打算把她推上王位。恐怕不会有比这更好的时机执行斩首行动了，是吧？”
languages.original_text: "And then another two to get into the regent's good graces and reach Eurac V. Now Cassia is in the spotlight and the House council is about to put her on the throne — surely there is no better time to cut off the serpent's head?"

traits.locale_text: “在那之后，我们之中的两个人赢得了摄政王的青睐，渗透到了欧拉克五号星。如今，卡西娅正站在聚光灯下，家族肯定打算把她推上王位。恐怕不会有比这更好的时机执行斩首行动了，是吧？”
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: «Y dos más para ganarnos al regente y llegar a Eurac V. Y ahora Cassia está en el centro de atención y el consejo de la casa está a punto de entronizarla. ¿Qué mejor momento hay para decapitar a la serpiente?».
languages.original_text: "And then another two to get into the regent's good graces and reach Eurac V. Now Cassia is in the spotlight and the House council is about to put her on the throne — surely there is no better time to cut off the serpent's head?"

traits.locale_text: «Y dos más para ganarnos al regente y llegar a Eurac-V. Y ahora Cassia está en el centro de atención y el consejo de la casa está a punto de entronizarla. ¿Qué mejor momento hay para decapitar a la serpiente?».
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: 「それから、摂政の機嫌を取り、ユーラック・Vに到達するまでにもう2つ。今や、カシアは注目の的であり、家門の評議会は彼女を王位に就かせようとしている…蛇の頭を切り落とすのに、これ以上のタイミングはないでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "And then another two to get into the regent's good graces and reach Eurac V. Now Cassia is in the spotlight and the House council is about to put her on the throne — surely there is no better time to cut off the serpent's head?"

traits.locale_text: 「それから、摂政の機嫌を取り、ユーラック・Vに到達するまでにもう2つ。今や、カシアは注目の的であり、家門の評議会は彼女を王位に就かせようとしている…蛇の頭を切り落とすのに、これ以上のタイミングはないでしょう？」
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Weitere zwei, um die Gunst des Regenten zu erlangen und Eurac V zu erreichen. Jetzt steht Cassia im Rampenlicht, und der Rat des Hauses will sie auf den Thron setzen – gibt es einen besseren Zeitpunkt, um der Schlange den Kopf abzuschlagen?"
languages.original_text: "And then another two to get into the regent's good graces and reach Eurac V. Now Cassia is in the spotlight and the House council is about to put her on the throne — surely there is no better time to cut off the serpent's head?"

traits.locale_text: "Weitere zwei, um die Gunst des Regenten zu erlangen und Eurac-V zu erreichen. Jetzt steht Cassia im Rampenlicht, und der Rat des Hauses will sie auf den Thron setzen – gibt es einen besseren Zeitpunkt, um der Schlange den Kopf abzuschlagen?"
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: « Entrer dans les bonnes grâces du régent et atteindre Eurac-V nous coûta deux années supplémentaires. Maintenant que Cassia est sous le feu des projecteurs et que le conseil de la maison s'apprête à la faire monter sur le trône, il nous semblait que le moment était venu de trancher la tête de la vipère. »
languages.original_text: "And then another two to get into the regent's good graces and reach Eurac V. Now Cassia is in the spotlight and the House council is about to put her on the throne — surely there is no better time to cut off the serpent's head?"

traits.locale_text: « Entrer dans les bonnes grâces du régent et atteindre Eurac-V nous coûta deux années supplémentaires. Maintenant que Cassia est sous le feu des projecteurs et que le conseil de la maison s'apprête à la faire monter sur le trône, il nous semblait que le moment était venu de trancher la tête de la vipère. »
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Naibin yanına sokulmamız ve Eurac V'e ulaşmamız da iki yıl daha aldı. Artık Cassia gün yüzüne çıktı ve Hane konseyi onu tahta çıkarmaya hazır. Yılanın başını kesmek için daha iyi bir zaman olamaz, yanılıyor muyum?"
languages.original_text: "And then another two to get into the regent's good graces and reach Eurac V. Now Cassia is in the spotlight and the House council is about to put her on the throne — surely there is no better time to cut off the serpent's head?"

traits.locale_text: "Naibin yanına sokulmamız ve Eurac V'e ulaşmamız da iki yıl daha aldı. Artık Cassia gün yüzüne çıktı ve Hane konseyi onu tahta çıkarmaya hazır. Yılanın başını kesmek için daha iyi bir zaman olamaz, yanılıyor muyum?"
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader
